# Permissions

Add and update app access permissions. 


`````{tabs}

````{tab} Sample Text

```text
app: permissions 
options: action = create; name = "someone new"; phone = "12223334455"

groceries, wordhunt, jokes
```
````

````{tab} Sample Response

```text
Added permissions for Someone New. groceries, wordhunt, jokes.
```
````
`````
